meanings.definition: A type of hard wheat used in making pasta.
meanings.sent1: The durum wheat fields stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent2: I bought a bag of durum flour to make homemade pasta.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to bury an acorn in the durum wheat field.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as durum wheat.
meanings.sent5: The golden durum grains shimmered in the sunlight, ready to be harvested.

meanings.definition: A type of pasta made from durum wheat.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served a delicious dish of durum pasta with marinara sauce.
meanings.sent2: She cooked durum spaghetti for dinner last night.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the durum pasta was tiny worms on their plates.
meanings.sent4: The strands of durum pasta intertwined like a dance on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the durum pasta cooking filled the kitchen with warmth.
